title: Allowlist additional Platform Admin Principal ID

requirements.text: Add the Internet Identity Principal ID "7sopg-rkdvi-vg7tv-4foks-ejhyr-rotwu-wcdxm-kkij6-zwzel-qownx-aae" to the backend platform-admin allowlist so this principal is recognized as a Platform Admin (isPlatformAdmin = true) and can access the Team/Admin portal admin screens after signing in.
acceptanceCriteria: After deployment/upgrade, signing in with Principal ID 7sopg-rkdvi-vg7tv-4foks-ejhyr-rotwu-wcdxm-kkij6-zwzel-qownx-aae results in getCallerRole().isPlatformAdmin returning true.
With that principal authenticated, the user can access the Team/Admin portal and load admin-only pages guarded by platform-admin checks (no access denied due to missing allowlist entry).
No existing platform-admin allowlist entries are removed or altered as part of this change.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing the admin order authorization/assignment workflow.
Adding or changing customer profile fields.
Updating branding/logo assets or header/footer UI.
